/** * Using Require.js to define a module responsible for creating a KO view model. */ define( [ 'jquery', 'knockout' ], function( $, ko ) { /** * @constructor - A function constructor to create a KO view model for the events list view. This view model is responsible for all the functions * related to the corresponding events view and creates a two way data binding between the view and the view model for simplifying DOM manipulation. */ var EditEmailerViewModel = function() { // returning the EventsListViewModel return this; }; // returning the EditEmailerViewModel constructor return EditEmailerViewModel; });
